text: inezīya yamenuna yetesededu፡፡ be’ālahimi menigedi layi begenizebochachewina benefisochachewi yetagelu፡፡ inezīyami (sidetenyochuni) yasit’eguna yeredu፡፡ inezīya kefīlochachewi lekefīlu redatochi nachewi፡፡ inezīyami yamenuna yalitesededu isikemīsededu diresi kenesu minimi zimidina yelachihumi፡፡ behayimanotimi iridatani bīfeligubachihu be’inanitena benesu mekakeli k’ali kīdani balachihu ḥizibochi layi kaliẖone besitek’eri benanite layi meridati ālebachihu፡፡ ālahimi yemitišerutini hulu temelikachi newi፡፡
